1) 10.65.100.3/21
   
      10.65.100.3 => 00001010.01000001.011 00100.00000011

/21 255.255.248.0 => 11111111.11111111.111 11000.00000000
   


 network address =>00001010.01000001.01100000.00000000 =>10.65.96.0

No of subnet borrowed = 21-8(class A) =13 bits

Number of subnets possible =2^13=8192

No. of Host bits Remaining= 24(default)-13(subnets) =11 

Number of hosts possible in each subnet = (2^11)-2=2048-2=2046
